_header: Honour and beauty virtue and gentleness
Title(s): ‘A Ballade to his Sovereign Mistress’; ‘Balade coulourd and reuersid’
_description: John Lydgate, ‘A Ballade to his Sovereign Mistress’, or ‘Balade coulourd and reuersid’ — three 8-line stanzas and 4-line Envoy

BLAru26.First Lines:
Honnour and beaute vertue and gentilnesseNoblesse and bounte of
                    grete valure…
BLAru26.Last Lines:
…Witnesse thowe I doo in this scripturePite savyng ye want no
                    thyng certeyne
